title: Breaking2 Project
content: Breaking2 was a project by Nike to break the 2-hour barrier for the marathon. To get a taste for what kind of feat this is, put a treadmill at 13.1 mph, sprint for about a minute, and imagine keeping up a pace somewhere in this ballpark for 2 hours.

title: Kipchoge Number
content: In running circles they have a 'Kipchoge number.' This is just like the aforementioned treadmill experiment: how long (in distance) can you keep up with Kipchoge at his marathon pace? The average person can probably keep his pace for 20 meters.

title: Breaking2 Documentary
content: The Breaking2 documentary is a great combination of physiology, psychology, engineering, and the pursuit of excellenceâ€”in a movement that is etched into human history.
